name: Transcendence Legacy: Voidswept (Early Demo)
description:
"At last, the true liberator has awakened."

Transcendence Legacy: Voidswept is a sequel to Transcendence Legacy. While it is recommended to play the first game, playing the first game is not neccessary to understand the story of Voidswept.

Zarth, a young man with no recollection of his past, will discover his true identity, as well as the crucial role he is supposed to play in a decaying world plagued by void.

This is a short early demo of the game, showing only the first area. Everything shown in the demo is not final and is subject to change.
